articles.title: Exemption for Canadian travellers in South Africa in effect - CTV News

articles.description: An anonymous outside investor has negotiated a $5 million deal with the people who lost money in the collapsed Africrypt scheme.

articles.title: Value for money or subpar service? Actor returning from SA questions quarantine meals in UK - TimesLIVE
articles.description: Eswatini-born English actor Richard E Grant is spending 10 days at the four-star Holiday Inn at Gatwick in the UK after visiting his mother in Southern Africa when the Omicron variant was discovered in SA.

articles.title: Total solar eclipse seen from Union Glacier, Antarctica - Africanews English
articles.description:
A total solar eclipse could be seen from Antarctica on Saturday with NASA live streaming the event, showing a striking image of the sky darkening.
Those living in southern parts of Africa, Australia and South America could also witness a partial solar eclipse.
